Title: A Worthy Challenge: Durand
Description:
$n, I need you to assemble a stout group and lead them into Scarlet Monastery. Activate the Challenger's Orb therein, and smite Durand with righteous fury.

Return to me when you've completed this challenge, and I shall reward you handsomely.
ObjectivesText: Complete the Scarlet Monastery Challenge Mode.

Objectives.Text: Complete the Scarlet Monastery Challenge Mode
